homeCore.subtitle: Your Way to the Arcade
homeCore.welcomeText:
Welcome to Play Off Rentals, your premier destination for rental arcade games! We specialize in providing a wide variety of classic and modern arcade games for all types of events and gatherings. Whether you're hosting a corporate event, birthday party, wedding, or any other special occasion, we have the perfect arcade games to bring fun and excitement to your guests.

At Play Off Rentals, we believe in creating memorable experiences through the joy of gaming. Our extensive selection includes everything from timeless classics like Pac-Man and Donkey Kong to the latest and greatest in arcade gaming. Each game is carefully maintained and regularly serviced to ensure the best possible experience for our clients.

Our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service and ensuring that your event is a resounding success. We offer flexible rental packages tailored to meet your specific needs and budget. From delivery and setup to on-site support, we handle all the details so you can focus on enjoying the festivities.

Thank you for considering Play Off Rentals for your arcade game rental needs. We look forward to helping you create an unforgettable event!

q1.question: How is pricing calculated?
q1.answer: Pricing is based on the subtotal of the machines, multiplied by the number of rental days, plus tax and a service fee (whichever is higher between $25 or 7%).
q1.example: Ex: Say a customer orders one 100$ machine for 3 days. The total would be: 100 * 3 (Days of Rent) + 300 * 13% (HST)  + 25 (Service Fee) = 364$.

q2.question: What is your service range?
q2.answer: We service within 10 km of our address.

q3.question: Can I rent different machines for different durations?
q3.answer: All machines in a single order must share the same rental period. If you need different time frames, you can place separate orders.

q4.question: Do you handle delivery and pickup?
q4.answer: Yes! We handle both delivery and pickup within our service range. Delivery and pickup fees are included in your service fee.

q5.question: What if I need to extend my rental?
q5.answer: Unfortunately, we don't currently extending a rental is not a feature. If you want to 'extend' the best thing to do would be to place another order and contact us.

q6.question: Is there a deposit or damage policy?
q6.answer: A refundable security deposit may apply depending on the equipment. We also inspect all machines before and after each rental to ensure theyâ€™re in great working condition.
